channel.title: Game crashes at first loading screen
channel.description: When I get to the first loading screen the game freezes, doesn't get past that screen. I have to go into task manager to quit out which says hl2.exe not responding. Have uninstalled and reinstalled and still get the same problem. Couldn't find a mdmp file either so unable to attach that. Anyone able to help?

item.title: Game crashes at first loading screen
item.dc:creator: mshee32
item.description:
make sure graphics card drivers are all up to date

Read full topic
